forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with light rain this evening...thunderstorms developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with light rain this evening...thunderstorms developing overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning, then a few lingering showers possible during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with occasional rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 10C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 52F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High 9C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 4C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 41F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
